ygData.subject: RE: griffenes... was Tracking
ygData.msgSnippet: it is 100, 1000 or something very close.  if you find the named treant X-something long name, the tower is right in front of him. also regarding wearing
ygData.messageBody:
it is 100, 1000 or something very close. if you find the named treant
X-something long name, the tower is right in front of him.

also regarding wearing different bracers (until you get your seconde
lambent)... place the bracer you do not want people to see in your wrist
slot 1 first, then place the bracer you do want people to see in wrist slot
2. at this time you and everyone will see what is in wrist slot 2. after
you zone however, YOU will see what is in wrist slot 1, but everyone else
will see what is in wrist slot 2. just a short-term fix, i know its
annoying i have been /bugging it since the first month of release.

Shada

> From: "CYR, Thierry" <tcyr@...>
>
> speaking of which, at some point on this list, someone posted
> the loc of a
> spawn spot of a griffene, im so sick of wandering around
> aimlessly with only
> griffawns spawning on me, and the few times i do get a
> griffene it doesnt
> have the charm. gets annoying to switch bracers all the time
> so that the
> blue shows instead of my silver plated one.
>
> Anyone able to help me out by giving me a loc of a spawn spot of these
> annoying critters to find
>
> Minkin
> Sol ro
